mapper.select: SELECT sta.led_sn, sta.number FROM dhlk_light_area area JOIN dhlk_light_led led ON area.id = led.area_id JOIN ( SELECT led_sn, SUM( number) AS number FROM dhlk_light_cloud_people_feel_statistics where DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{date} GROUP BY led_sn ) sta ON led.sn = sta.led_sn where area.id = #{areaId}
